tool_description: United States NOAA tide height and time predictions in JSON format.
title: NOAA Tides

api_list.name: Get station information
api_list.description: Get information about the provided station ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://noaa-tides.p.rapidapi.com/stations/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "noaa-tides.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get tides for a station
api_list.description: Get tide information for the given station ID in local times.

api_list.name: Get stations
api_list.description: Get list of all NOAA stations that provide tide predictions to be used in other endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://noaa-tides.p.rapidapi.com/stations"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "noaa-tides.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
